body.name: Mothca Matte Glass Screen Protector for iPhone XR/iPhone 11 [6.1-inch] Anti-Glare & Anti-Fingerprint, 9H Hardness Tempered Glass Film, Case Friendly Easy Installation Bubble Free - Smooth as Silk
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery March 4 - 24 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
FREE pickup March 4 - 24 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
features: 【HD Clear】Screen Protector Compatible with iPhone 11/XR , Tempered Glass with 9H screen hardness, Mothca matte screen protector is matte finish but also HD clear. While some poor quality matte glass has poor clarity and transparency, we promise you never needn’t worry about the same problem for Mothca Matte Glass.

【Smooth as Silk】The perfect matte surface has the silk-like touch feeling, magically resists dirt, sweat and annoying fingerprints, very little frictional resistance even for hand sweating. Easy to flick operation, "Comfortable Game Operation". 100% touch accurate and 3D-touch sensing.
【Anti-Glare】The matte finish tempered glass using the same technology as E-reader matte screen, no screen glare, even in bright sunlight, no dazzling, easy reading outdoor or under light.

【Go Further Than 2.5D Round Edge】A special polishing is crafted to edge of the glass to give a more smooth touch feeling, go further than 2.5D round edge, not easy to be broken and extremely durable.9H hardness, protect your iPhone 11/XR screen from scratches, daily wear and drops.
【What is Included】1 piece Mothca matte screen protector for iPhone 11/XR , cleaning set, dust remover.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Mothca Matte Screen Protector for iPhone 11/ XR 6.1-inch CASE FRIENDLY: Mothca iPhone 11/ XR Matte screen protector will allow you to use almost all kinds of case. DAILY PROTECTION: Designed with a hydrophobic and oleophobic coating and an anti-scratch surface to protect your screen from accidental spills, oil residue from fingerprints, bumps and daily wear-and-tear. Package included: 1 x Matte Tempered Glass Screen Protector1 x Dry cleaning wipe1 x Wet cleaning wipe1 x Dust wiping sticky tape1 x Retail Packaging

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 5, 2020
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Excellent value -- rivals other matte finish screen protectors
reviews.reviewText: First and foremost, if you haven't tried a matte screen protector, at this price there is no excuse not to experience how smooth, responsive and virtually smudge free this covering is.I really love this matte screen protector! It's extremely smooth to the touch, prevents glare, and does not show small scuffs or scratches like traditional screen protectors. I really appreciate the way the matte screen not only protects the phone, but really allows for the colors of the screen to be softened, not blaring and overly glossy.Maybe the best part is the cost — when i first purchased my iPhone 11 I purchased a brand-name Zagg screen protector and it was considerably more expensive. This screen protector is as good or BETTER than the Zagg protector (which is also no longer in production).My only problem is the glass appears a little delaminated on two very small areas at the very edge of the screen protector. This does not affect the function or the appearance of the screen protector at all as they are both on the very edges of the screen.Installation was effortless and it even installed without air bubbles. Most importantly, it's already saved me recently after one major drop.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 25, 2019
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars BEST SCREEN PROTECTOR EVER!
reviews.reviewText: ** Updated review! See below!***I am in LOVE with this screen protector.It went on super easy with zero bubbles, and the seams fully sealed.The anti glare is amazing. They accomplish this by ever so slightly frosting the glass. I love the matte look, and the feel of it is heavenly. Your fingers glide effortlessly across the screen. It is a VERY satisfying swiping experience.BUT, this comes at a tiny cost. As another reviewer stated, it does, ever so slightly, take away a little of the crispness of things. It is mostly noticeable in small text, if the phone is super close. But like I said, it is slight. If you have OCD, that may bother you. I have been using it for 2 full days, and it hasn’t bothered me much. I watched an HD movie, and it looked great.It shows almost no fingerprints, only if your fingers are oily and the screen is off. The screen wipes perfectly clean in one swipe on my shirt. I am SO satisfied with the look and feel of this protector, that I will be keeping it, despite the SLIGHTLY diminished clarity. Give it a try, I think you will love it too!I hope this helps!***Update: changing from 4 to 5 stars. Been using this screen protector for 5 months now. See the pics where my phone has a black case on, those are pics from today. (The pic with the clear case was from week one.) Notice my screen protector is good as new. No scratches, no finger prints, no cracks. Still has the ever-so-satisfying smooth swiping experience. BEST SCREEN PROTECTOR EVER!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 18, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I absolutely love this brand! This is my third time using their screen protectors. The mat screen is great at reducing glare, and very strong.The reason I had to replace my screen this time, is because I slammed my phone in the car door. And the screen protector was broken but my phone was not. The material is very strong and is so great.! 👌👌👌😉😉🤩🤩🤩💪💪💪🤩

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 31, 2020
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Great Screen Protector
reviews.reviewText: It went on super easy with zero bubbles, and the seams fully sealed.The anti glare is amazing. Your fingers glide effortlessly across the screen with a great swiping feel. However, as another reviewer stated, it does slightly take away the crispness of things. It is mostly noticeable in small text and while outside when it’s sunny. But this seems inevitable so not such a big deal. It shows only minimal fingerprints if your fingers are oily and the screen is off. Again, inevitable with any screen protector.All in all, I am SO satisfied with the look and feel of this protector despite the SLIGHTLY diminished clarity. Give it a try, I think you will love it too.I hope this helps!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 18, 2020
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Best screen protector user experience tho not very durable.
reviews.reviewText: I have had 3 of these screen protectors in the past and they are hands down the best to use screen protector I have ever owned or used. I get compliments all the time on how smooth and cool feeling my screen is. It has a odd color to the screen that is hit or miss to people if they like it or not. The screen isn’t the strongest screen protector I’ve used as you would assume since I’ve gone through 2 of them, but they are far cheaper than the more high end ones and they give a far better experience. The edges on the screen are so much nicer than any other screen protector I’ve used since they are smooth and don’t catch my fingers ever. This is amazing for all of the swiping gestures that the iPhone X series and above uses. One of the times I broke the screen protector was not do to it being weak, (I stepped on it hard while playing tennis) but the second lasted me almost 8 months and it Just had some wear and tear. I had 2-3 small chips and scratches but otherwise totally fine. The application is very easy and it goes on super well and quick. The box gives you plenty of tools however not amazing instructions. The box it comes in is neat and clean looking while not being too extravagant. The first two went on without any issues and zero bubbles. The one I have most recently put on had a bubble in the center but it was easy to safely lift off clean the dust and really thus removing the bubble. It also came with card to send another screen protector as a free gift to a friend with shipping paid also.My overall opinion is that is is an amazing user experience, it is more expensive than cheap screens but far cheaper than high end. It is great if you are willing to shell out the money to go through a few of them since they are relatively cheap but not amazingly durable.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 28, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very sleek and crispy
reviews.reviewText: The screen protector is amazing. I believe this is a glass protector because it feels like it. It doesn’t cause glare because it diffuses light but at the same time it feels incredibly nice on the fingertips. Very smooth and soft on the tips like I’ve never felt before. It’s also the first time I have put on a screen protector without leaving any bubbles! The package comes with the appropriate tools to apply the screen protector as close to perfect as possible. If my protector cracks, I will be coming back here to order another one!
Ease of installation. Product as good as advertised.
Super Folie, matt und leicht anzubringen :)

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on August 28, 2023
reviews.reviewText: The smooth texture of the screen protector feels amazing. I have a lot of scratches on my iPhone 11’s original screen and this protector has made my experience with my phone 10x better. The only thing is that if you’re not used to feeling a matte texture on your phone it takes a day or two to get used to but it’s amazing and I’ll definitely buy one again.
Buona adesione allo schermo zero ditate zero impronte. Non c’è il fastidioso riflesso che non permette di vedere.Qualità prezzo ottimaiPhone XR
Facile à installer, pas de bulles l’effet mate est très agréable au touché.
